/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses moving along the road. On the sidewalks, people can be seen going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
